Module app.supernaut.fx
Package app.supernaut.fx

Interface FxForegroundApp.FxApplicationCompat

All Superinterfaces:
ForegroundApp, FxForegroundApp
Enclosing interface:
FxForegroundApp
public static interface FxForegroundApp.FxApplicationCompat extends FxForegroundApp
This interface makes converting from an instance of Application easier.

Simply change

class MyFXForegroundApp extends Application

to

class MyFXForegroundApp implements FxApplicationCompat

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Start method compatible with OpenJFX start method
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - primary stage (unwrapped)

    • start

      default void start(FxForegroundApp.FxMainView mainView)
      Description copied from interface: FxForegroundApp
      The main entry point for Supernaut.fx applications. Called from the OpenJFX start() method. At a minimum, you must implement this method.

      NOTE: This method is called on the JavaFX Application Thread.

      Specified by:
      start in interface FxForegroundApp
      Parameters:
      mainView - A wrapper view containing the primary Stage
